entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
